abstract: Many people in Denmark are questioning whether Omar Abdel Hamid El-Hussein's deadly rampage was motivated by Islam or whether his claim serves as cover for inherent violent criminality; link between Islam and violence is being heavily debated both in Europe and in the United States after string of deadly attacks perpetrated by angry Muslim youth.
lead_paragraph: The attacks last weekend have stirred soul-searching in Denmark over whether Islam merely served as a justifying cover for violent criminality.

headline.main: After Attacks, Denmark Hesitates to Blame Islam
headline.print_headline: After Deadly Attacks, Danes Weigh Islam’s Place in a Tangle of Motives

snippet: The attacks last weekend have stirred soul-searching in Denmark over whether Islam merely served as a justifying cover for violent criminality.
